title: Jackie O gives fans a glimpse inside her lavish dressing room backstage at The Masked Singer
text:
While security has been insanely tight around The Masked Singer, Jackie 'O' Henderson offered fans a rare glimpse into what goes on behind the scenes.

Taking to Instagram Stories on Monday, the 44-year-old panelist shared a photo from her lavish dressing room.

After taking her nine-year-old daughter, Kitty, to work with her, Jackie shared a sweet photo of the two of them relaxing in her dressing room alongside Jackie's hair and makeup artist, Max May.

Life of luxury: After taking her nine-year-old daughter Kitty to work with her, Jackie 'O' Henderson shared a sweet photo of the two of them relaxing in her dressing room alongside Jackie's hair and makeup artist, Max May

The dressing room appears warm and homely with couches and cushions, giving no indication it belongs backstage in a sound studio.

Jackie and Kitty are seen sitting on cushions, which had been placed on top of a rug sprawled out on the floor.

There are two round white coffee tables, with one filled with plates of food, while Jackie clutched what appeared to have been a glass of wine.

Backstage pass: While security has been insanely tight around The Masked Singer, Jackie offered fans a rare glimpse into what goes on behind the scenes

Access all areas: It's a rare glimpse into what goes on behind the scenes of the highly secretive show, which has gone to extreme lengths to conceal the identity of the masked singers

Dark leather couches are pushed back against the white walls, with yellow and aqua throw cushions strategically placed around the room.

Max is sprawled out on one lounge, with a tan coloured throw rug behind his head, and a series of prints on the wall behind him.

There's a plant in one corner, with a nearby lamp emanating a soft golden glow throughout the room.

Sneak peek: Jackie regularly gives fans an insight into what goes on behind the scenes of the show, while being careful not to reveal too much

'Quick snack backstage with Kitty & @maxmade,' Jackie captioned the photo, which shows her chatting with her stylist.

It's a rare glimpse into what goes on behind the scenes of the highly secretive show, which has gone to extreme lengths to conceal the identity of the masked singers.

In an interview with The Advertiser last month, Jackie described the show's security as 'next level' and 'ridiculously high'.
description: While security has been insanely tight around The Masked Singer, Jackie 'O' Henderson offered fans a rare glimpse into what goes on behind the scenes, showing off her dressing room.
authors: Demeter Stamell For Daily Mail Australia
